name: Garment Manufacturers Association of Cambodia
goal:
Cambodian trade association representing the interests of GTF (Garment, Textiles and Footwear) sector. GMAC memberships is composed of 515 garment factories ; 42 footwear and 25 travel goods factories. Together GMAC members employ 650.000 workers.
GMAC's mission is to make Cambodia a preferred partner in the competitive global apparel and footwear market.
interests: Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, External Relations, Trade
euInitiatives: EU Cambodia trade and development relations. Policy and regulatory issues affecting the trade of garment, textiles and footwear products
